synopsis: Edward and Alphonse Elric confront the mysterious Ice Alchemist in Central City while the military observes their unusual abilities.
A flashback reveals the brothers' tragic attempt at human transmutation and the terrible price they paid.
The Elrics investigate a town ruled by a false prophet who uses a Philosopher's Stone to perform so-called miracles.
The brothers meet Shou Tucker, whose disturbing secret reveals the dark side of alchemical ambition.
After tragedy strikes, Edward struggles with guilt while Scar begins targeting State Alchemists.
The brothers search for clues about the Philosopher's Stone and uncover suspicious research linked to the military.
As secrets about the Philosopher's Stone emerge, the Elrics realize the cost of its creation.
Edward infiltrates an abandoned lab and encounters powerful armored guardians tied to forbidden experiments.
Alphonse questions his own existence after learning unsettling truths about his body and soul.
The brothers part ways temporarily to pursue different leads while dark forces move behind the scenes.
In Rush Valley, automail engineers and thieves complicate the brothers' journey.

title_english: One is All, All is One
synopsis: The Elrics revisit their teacher Izumi and reflect on the philosophy behind alchemy.
A confrontation in Dublith reveals more about the mysterious homunculi and their plans.
